hadith.text: It was narrated that Abu Ishaq said:"I came to Al-Aswad bin Yazid, who was a close friend of mine and said: 'O Abu 'Amr, tell me what the Mother of the Believers told you about the prayer of the Messenger of Allah (ï·º).' He said: 'She said: "He used to sleep for the first part of the night and stay up for the latter part
